data.title: PS2 Classics Emulator Compatibility List
data.meta_description: Playstation Development Wiki - PS5, PS4, PS3, PS2, PS1, PSP, Vita Information
data.text:
Game Name PAL‐EU NTSC‐U NTSC‐J Compatibility Notes D1 Professional Drift Grand Prix Series Not Available Playable Playable Daemon Summoner Playable Not Available Not Available Dai Senryaku VII: Exceed Not Available Playable Available Dance Dance Revolution EXTREME Not Available Playable Playable Emulator configuration available. Config fixes button input at song select wheel. Dance Dance Revolution EXTREME 2 Not Available Playable Not Available Game stutters while in Dance Master mode, but remains navigable. No effect on actual gameplay. Dance Dance Revolution SuperNOVA Available Playable Playable Dance Dance Revolution SuperNOVA 2 Available Playable Playable Dance Dance Revolution X Not Available Major Issues Available Steady desyncing of the game and the game's audio during gameplay. This is a known issue even on PCSX2 and is substantially more pronounced on CFW. There's nothing unplayable about it, but as a rhythm game, it is rendered pointless. Dance Dance Revolution X2 Not Available Major Issues Not Available Same issues as its predecessor. Dance Summit 2001: Bust a Move

• ダンスサミット2001 バスト・ア・ムーブ

Not Available Not Available Playable Config fixes the frozen screen. Some framebuffer effects used in certain stages are not rendered properly, causing short term freeze frames. Dark Angel: Vampire Apocalypse Not Available Playable Available Dark Chronicle

• Dark Cloud 2

Minor Issues Minor Issues Available Minor graphic glitches & some frame drop. Dark Cloud Playable Playable PS2 Classic Emulator configuration available (NTSC-J). Config disables shadows and improves FPU accuracy. Dark Summit Playable Playable Not Available Darkwatch Minor Issues Minor Issues Not Available Config fixes freeze during loading of 8th level (Rescue) and fixes performance of main menu. Weapon animations appear disjointed and wrong. Dave Mirra's Freestyle BMX 2 Available Playable Not Available Dawn of Mana

• Seiken Densetsu 4 (聖剣伝説4)

Not Available Playable Playable Config fixes missing geometry and looped sound effects. Nevertheless, some animated parts of models do twitch in the cut scenes. DDRMAX2: Dance Dance Revolution Not Available Playable Playable Emulator configuration available. Config fixes button input at song select wheel. DDRMAX: Dance Dance Revolution Not Available Playable Playable Emulator configuration available. Config fixes button input at song select wheel. Dead or Alive 2

• DOA2: Dead or Alive 2

• DOA2: Hardcore

• DOA2: Hard*Core

Playable PS2 Classic PS2 Classic Emulator configuration available. Config fixes the black screen on startup (EE cache issue). Dead to Rights Available Playable Not Available Dead to Rights II Available Playable Not Available Experienced slight jump in audio during opening cut scene. Dear Boys: Fast Break! Not Available Not Available Playable Death By Degrees Available Playable Available Def Jam Vendetta Available Playable Available Config sets multitap controller ports properly. May shut off PS3 during loading sequences. Def Jam: Fight for NY Playable Playable Available Config sets multitap controller ports properly. An extremely minor graphic bug occurs in stores midway through game, but it lasts only a second and is barely noticeable. Initial loading screen can soft lock. Resetting can fix this. Defender Available Playable Not Available Graphical glitches in menus on left side that don't seem to appear in game. Delta Force - Black Hawk Down: Team Sabre Playable Available Not Available Demon Chaos Available Not Available PS2 Classic Empty emulator configuration. Densha de GO! Final Not Available Not Available Playable Config fixes graphical corruption. Destroy All Humans! Minor Issues Minor Issues Available Config fixes texture flickering caused by mipmapping and anal probe bug. Alpha effects (sun and lights) are visible through 3D objects. Destroy All Humans! 2 Minor Issues Minor Issues Not Available Config fixes texture flickering caused by mipmapping. Alpha effects (sun and lights) are visible through 3D objects. Destruction Derby Arenas Minor Issues Minor Issues Not Available NTSC config fixes the white tires. There is small glitch in menu/loading. Little slowdown during the gameplay. Deus Ex

• Deus Ex: The Conspiracy

PS2 Classic Playable Not Available Empty emulator configuration. Devil Kings Available Playable Not Available Visible, though not intrusive, graphical error on skyboxes and particle effects. Devil May Cry

• Devil May Cry HD Collection (PS3)

Minor Issues Minor Issues Available Emulator configuration available. Noticeable slowdown and game will crash on ending cutscene (needs confirmation with config applied). An HD remaster is available. Devil May Cry 2

• Devil May Cry HD Collection (PS3)

Playable Available Available An HD remaster is available. Devil May Cry 3: Dante's Awakening

• Devil May Cry 3: Special Edition

• Devil May Cry 3: Dante's Awakening Special Edition

• Devil May Cry HD Collection (PS3)

Minor Issues Minor Issues Available Emulator configuration available. Config fixes boss fight selector on the monolith in the 18th mission. Frame drops in large ambients with a lot of lights and on some cutscenes. Screen shaking/jitter issues (field rendered game). An HD remaster is available. Diabolik: The Original Sin Playable Not Available Not Available Die Hard: Vendetta Playable Not Available Not Available PAL version quite smooth. Digimon Rumble Arena 2

• Digimon Battle Chronicle (デジモンバトルクロニクル

Playable Playable Playable Config sets multitap controller ports properly. Config should fix random freezes (needs confirmation with current config updated 4/29/23). Digimon World 4 Playable Playable Available Digimon World: Data Squad Not Available Playable Playable Dino Stalker Available Available Minor Issues Framerate drop at some places. Dirge of Cerberus: Final Fantasy VII

• Dirge of Cerberus: Final Fantasy VII International

Playable Playable Minor Issues Config fixes looped sound effects. Original NTSC-J version has an invisible barrier in Chapter 10 when jumping into a path from a waterway, making it impossible to pass through. NTSC-U, PAL, and NTSC-J International do not have this bug. Disaster Report

• SOS: The Final Escape

• Zettai Zetsumei Toshi (絶体絶命都市)

Playable Playable PS2 Classic Emulator configuration available. Disgaea: Hour of Darkness Playable PS2 Classic Playable Empty emulator configuration. Disgaea 2: Cursed Memories Available PS2 Classic Available Empty emulator configuration. Disney Bolt PS2 Classic Available Not Available Empty emulator configuration. Disney G-Force PS2 Classic Playable Not Available Empty emulator configuration. Disney Golf Available Minor Issues Available Config fixes all freezes (VIF1 related). Screen turns black on crossfades and while using shot meter. Shot meter is still visible. Disney Princess: Enchanted Journey PS2 Classic Playable Playable Empty emulator configuration. Disney's Chicken Little PS2 Classic Playable Playable Empty emulator configuration. Disney's Donald Duck: Goin' Quackers

• Disney's Donald Duck: Quack Attack

PS2 Classic Playable Playable Empty emulator configuration. Disney's Extreme Skate Adventure Playable Playable Not Available Config fixes major graphical glitches and freezing. Disney's Kim Possible: What's the Switch? PS2 Classic Playable Not Available Empty emulator configuration. Disney's Meet the Robinsons PS2 Classic PS2 Classic Playable Emulator configuration available (NTSC-U/C only). Disney's Peter Pan: The Legend of Never-Land PS2 Classic Not Available Not Available Empty emulator configuration. Disney's PK: Out of the Shadows

• Disney's Donald Duck PK

PS2 Classic Playable Not Available Emulator configuration available. Config fixes the freeze after loading a level. Disney's Stitch: Experiment 626 PS2 Classic Playable Playable Empty emulator configuration. Disney's Tarzan Untamed Available Playable Available Disney's The Haunted Mansion Available Playable Available Disney's Treasure Planet PS2 Classic Playable Not Available Emulator configuration available. Config fixes the black screen at start. Disney's Winnie the Pooh's Rumbly Tumbly Adventure PS2 Classic Playable Not Available Empty emulator configuration. Disney/Pixar Cars PS2 Classic PS2 Classic Playable Empty emulator configuration. Disney/Pixar Cars: Mater-National Championship

• Disney/Pixar Cars: Mater-National Championship (PS3)

PS2 Classic Playable Not Available Empty emulator configuration. Minor slowdown and polygons flickering in some tracks. Disney/Pixar Cars: Race-O-Rama Available Minor Issues Not Available Avoid changing the display mode in the option menu or your display setting will mess up. Minor slowdown and texture flickering/ pop-in during races. Nothing game-breaking/ still playable. Disney/Pixar Finding Nemo PS2 Classic Playable Playable Emulator configuration available. Config fixes the pause menu freeze. Disney/Pixar Monsters, Inc. Not Available PS2 Classic Not Available Empty emulator configuration. Disney/Pixar Monsters, Inc.: Scare Island PS2 Classic Not Available Not Available Empty emulator configuration. Disney/Pixar Ratatouille Playable Playable Available A very minor texture-flickering occurs in water; in "Home Stink Home" and few other places but besides that game fully playable. Disney/Pixar The Incredibles PS2 Classic PS2 Classic Playable Empty emulator configuration. Disney/Pixar The Incredibles: Rise of the Underminer PS2 Classic Playable Playable Empty emulator configuration. Disney/Pixar Toy Story 3 PS2 Classic Available Not Available Empty emulator configuration. Disney/Pixar Up Available Playable Not Available Disney/Pixar WALL-E Playable PS2 Classic Not Available Empty emulator configuration. DJ: Decks & FX - House Edition Playable Not Available Not Available No USB peripheral support in the emulator. USB Headset is not required for the game. DoDonPachi DaiOuJou Not Available Not Available Playable Dog of Bay Not Available Not Available Major Issues Massive flickering of text and UI in menus and character select screens (VSYNC issue). Gameplay desyncs depending on the stage. Dog's Life Playable Playable Available Dokapon Kingdom Not Available Playable Available Chance to freeze at start menu, other than that plays perfectly. To get around freeze, let the intro video play for a bit before skippping it. Doko Demo Issho: Toro to Ippai

• どこでもいっしょ トロといっぱい

Not Available Not Available Playable Doko Demo Issho: Watashi na Ehon

• どこでもいっしょ 私なえほん

Not Available Not Available PS2 Classic Empty emulator configuration. Dora the Explorer: Dora Saves the Crystal Kingdom Not Available PS2 Classic Not Available Empty emulator configuration. Dora the Explorer: Dora Saves the Mermaids PS2 Classic PS2 Classic Not Available Empty emulator configuration. Dora the Explorer: Dora Saves the Snow Princess Available PS2 Classic Not Available Empty emulator configuration. Dora the Explorer: Journey to the Purple Planet Available Available Not Available Dora's Big Birthday Adventure Not Available PS2 Classic Not Available Emulator configuration available. Downhill Domination Playable Playable Available Downtown Run Playable Playable Not Available Dr. Muto Available Playable Not Available Some levels have graphical glitches but do not impact gameplay. Dragon Ball Z: Budokai

• Dragon Ball Z (ドラゴンボールZ)

• Dragon Ball Z: Budokai HD Collection (PS3)

Playable Playable Playable An HD remaster is available. Dragon Ball Z: Budokai 2

• Dragon Ball Z 2 (ドラゴンボールZ2)

Playable Playable Playable Dragon Ball Z: Budokai 3

• Dragon Ball Z 3 (ドラゴンボールZ3)

• Dragon Ball Z: Budokai HD Collection (PS3)

Playable Playable Playable An HD remaster is available. Dragon Ball Z: Budokai Tenkaichi

• Dragon Ball Z: Sparking! (ドラゴンボールZ Sparking!)

Playable Playable Playable Config improves frame rate. Dragon Ball Z: Budokai Tenkaichi 2

• Dragon Ball Z: Sparking! Neo (ドラゴンボールZ Sparking! NEO)

Playable Playable Playable Config improves frame rate. Dragon Ball Z: Budokai Tenkaichi 3

• Dragon Ball Z: Sparking! Meteor (ドラゴンボールZ Sparking! METEOR)

Playable Playable Playable Config improves frame rate. Dragon Ball Z: Infinite World Major Issues Playable Playable PAL version crashes randomly when entering a fight, the others works perfect Dragon Ball Z: Sagas Playable Major Issues Available The game is randomly blocked at the end of each phase Dragon Blaze Playable Not Available Not Available Dragon Quest & Final Fantasy in Itadaki Street Special Not Available Not Available Playable Config fixes black board spaces. Dragon Quest V Not Available Not Available Playable Config fixes characters getting stuck in a cutscene near the end of game. Dragon Quest VIII: Journey of the Cursed King Minor Issues Minor Issues Minor Issues Occasional Stuttering. PAL sometimes freezes when escaping from a battle. NTSC-U/C sometimes softlock after battle. Config do not fix these issues. Dragon Rage Available Playable Not Available Framerate a little sluggish. Dragon's Lair 3D Special Edition Minor Issues Not Available Not Available Some frame drops in certain locations. Drakan: The Ancients' Gates Playable Playable Not Available Config fixes all flashing shadows/lighting corruption, broken interactive switches, and pause menu freezing. Drakengard Minor Issues Minor Issues Minor Issues Config fixes slowdown on mission info screens and game over screen bug. Occasional slowdown in gameplay and cutscenes. Audio and text desync sometimes during cutscenes. Drakengard 2 Available Minor Issues Available Occasional jittery frame. DreamMix TV: World Fighters Not Available Not Available Playable DreamWorks & Aardman Flushed Away Playable Playable Not Available DreamWorks Bee Movie Game Available Playable Not Available DreamWorks Madagascar Playable Playable Available Config fixes fog/transparency bugs and Gloria's infinite walk after playing as Melman in Coming of Age level. DreamWorks Madagascar: Escape 2 Africa

• DreamWorks Madagascar: Escape 2 Africa (PS3)

Playable Minor Issues Not Available NTSC version tested by icymuffins, there are minor audio glitches when you start a new game but the games seems functional and playable. DreamWorks Shrek Smash n' Crash Racing Playable Available Not Available DreamWorks Shrek SuperSlam Playable Playable Not Available DreamWorks Shrek the Third Playable Available Not Available Driv3r Major Issues Major Issues Major Issues In the second mission, the police car always crash, making impossible to follow it, so it is impossible to complete the mission. Lag and graphical issues. Issues are unfixable at this point. Driven Available Playable Not Available NTSC Console: Seems OK. There is an NTSC patch available for this game, but it is not needed. Driver Parallel Lines Minor Issues Minor Issues Minor Issues The Settings option on pause menu tends to glitch the entire save game and make the game starts from the beginning 0%. The main character's idle animation has a glitch which causes the character's upper body to go back and forth, the game also suffers from performance issues. Driving Emotion Type-S Available Minor Issues Available Config fixes cars flying around/exiting. Minor frame drops on some stages causes missing geometry/HUD (VSYNC issue). Dropship: United Peace Force Available Playable Not Available Playable but on-screen text is messed up. DT Carnage Not Available Playable Not Available Config fixes graphical glitches due to mipmapping and flickering and slowdown issues. DT Racer Playable Playable Not Available Dual Hearts Not Available Playable PS2 Classic Emulator configuration available (NTSC-J). Frame drops during 'busy' scenes. Exactly the same as they were on an original PS2. Dynasty Tactics 2

• Sangokushi Senki 2 (三國志戦記２)

Playable PS2 Classic Playable Empty emulator configuration. Dynasty Warriors 2

• Shin Sangoku Musou (真・三國無双)

Playable Playable PS2 Classic Emulator configuration available. Config fixes the black screen at start and graphical corruption on musou mode intros. Dynasty Warriors 3

• Shin Sangoku Musou 2 (真・三國無双2)

Playable Playable PS2 Classic Emulator configuration available. Config fixes the black screen at start. Dynasty Warriors 3: Xtreme Legends Playable Playable Available Config fixes black screen at start. Dynasty Warriors 4

• Shin Sangoku Musou 3 (真・三國無双3)

PS2 Classic Playable PS2 Classic Emulator configuration available (NTSC-J only). Dynasty Warriors 4: Empires PS2 Classic Available Available Empty emulator configuration. Dynasty Warriors 5

• Shin Sangoku Musou 4 (真・三國無双4)

PS2 Classic Playable PS2 Classic Emulator configuration available (NTSC-J only). Dynasty Warriors 5: Xtreme Legends Playable Playable Available Dynasty Warriors: Gundam 2

• Dynasty Warriors: Gundam 2 (PS3)

• Gundam Musou 2 (ガンダム無双2)

Not Available Playable Available A small issue though, the health and musou bar are greyed out. Game Name PAL‐EU NTSC‐U NTSC‐J Compatibility Notes Mace Griffin: Bounty Hunter Available Available Not Available Mad Maestro!

• Bravo Music

• ブラボーミュージック

Playable Playable PS2 Classic Emulator configuration available. Custom config enables pressure sensitivity required by the game. Alternatively, the official config automatically selects correct pressure needed for conducting without the need for pressure sensitivity. Madden NFL 2001 Available Minor Issues Available Config fixes infinite loading before starting a game. Graphics jump, some slowdowns. Madden NFL 2002 Available Available Available Madden NFL 2003 Available Minor Issues Available Experimental config fixes freezing issues and slowdown. Mild pausing can occur for a couple of seconds at times. Madden NFL 2004 Available Minor Issues Not Available Graphics jump, some slowdowns. Madden NFL 2005 Available Minor Issues Available Graphics jump, some slowdowns. Madden NFL 06 Available Available Available Madden NFL 07 Available Available Available Madden NFL 08 Available Playable Available Madden NFL 09 Available Available Not Available Madden NFL 10 Available Major Issues Not Available Many graphical glitches once in game. The field flickers and hurts your eyes. No config files were available to test. Madden NFL 11 Not Available Available Not Available Madden NFL 12 Not Available Minor Issues Not Available Graphics jump, some slowdowns. Made Man Minor Issues Available Not Available At the Vietnam level major issues with camera on stationary machine gun this prevents you from detonating the bomb on the ruins and moving on. At all game play good. Mafia Playable Playable Not Available Config fixes freezing issues. Magic Pengel: The Quest For Color Not Available Playable Available Config fixes freezes during loading transitions. Magna Carta: Tears of Blood Available Playable Available Mahoutsukai Kuro-hime

• 魔砲使い黒姫

Not Available Not Available Playable Makai Kingdom: Chronicles of the Sacred Tome Available Playable Available Maken Shao: Demon Sword

• Maken Shao (魔剣爻)

PS2 Classic Not Available Available Empty emulator configuration. Minor SPS issues from walls and floors. PS2 Classic no longer available on the PlayStation Store. Malice Playable Playable Not Available Config fixes slowdown. Mana Khemia: Alchemists of Al-Revis Playable Playable Available Previous Notes: "Font cropped. The PSP version 'Mana Khemia: Student Alliance' works as a Remaster." / I tested the game myself for about an hour, never noticed any font cropping, and it plays perfect with no issues that I noticed. Mana Khemia 2: Fall of Alchemy Not Available Available PS2 Classic Emulator configuration available. Manhunt PS2 Classic PS2 Classic Not Available Emulator configuration available. Config fixes light overbrightness and shining through walls. Manhunt 2 Playable Playable Not Available Config improves frame rate and fixes freezing issues (needs confirmation). PAL version randomly freezes. Marc Eckō's Getting Up: Contents Under Pressure Playable Playable Available Mark Davis Pro Bass Challenge Available PS2 Classic Not Available Emulator configuration available. Marvel Nemesis: Rise of the Imperfects Unplayable Unplayable Unplayable Emulator configuration available. Unplayable due to the lack of timing accuracy required to fix lag and graphical glitches. Marvel Ultimate Alliance Available Playable Not Available Config improves frame rate. Marvel Ultimate Alliance 2 Available Playable Not Available Marvel Vs. Capcom 2 Available Playable Available Mashed: Drive to Survive Available Not Available Not Available Mashed: Fully Loaded

• Drive to Survive

• Simple 2000 Series Ultimate Vol. 28: Bousou! Kenka Grand Prix, Drive to Survive

• 闘走!喧嘩グランプリ 〜Drive to Survive〜

Playable Available Available Masters Of The Universe: Defenders of Grayskull Playable Not Available Not Available Mat Hoffman's Pro BMX 2 Playable Playable Available Maximo

• Maximo: Ghosts to Glory

PS2 Classic PS2 Classic Playable Empty emulator configuration. Maximo vs. Army of Zin

• Makai Eiyūki Makishimo: Mashin Monsutā no Yabō

• 魔界英雄記 マキシモ ～マシンモンスターの野望

PS2 Classic Playable Playable Empty emulator configuration. Max Payne PS2 Classic PS2 Classic Available Emulator configuration available. Max Payne 2: The Fall of Max Payne Available Playable Not Available Emulator configuration available. McDonald's Original Happy Disc Not Available Not Available Playable Config fixes freezing and black screen issues. Possible black screen after reentering Piposaru 2001 demo a second time after exiting. MDK 2 Armageddon Playable Playable Not Available Medal of Honor: Frontline

• Medal of Honor: Frontline (PS3)

Playable Playable Available An HD remaster is available. Medal of Honor: Rising Sun Playable Playable Available Medal of Honor: European Assault PS2 Classic Playable Playable Emulator configuration available. Config sets multitap controller ports properly. Medal of Honor: Vanguard Playable Playable Available Mega Man Anniversary Collection Not Available Playable Not Available Mega Man X Collection Not Available Minor Issues Not Available Major slowdown in Storm Eagle's stage in Mega Man X1, possible issues in others. Text boxes get overlapped by foreground sprites. Setting VSYNC DELAY to NO-IPU Aggressive rectified most slowdown. Mega Man X Command Mission Available Playable Available Mega Man X7 Available Playable Available Mega Man X8

• Rockman X8 (ロックマンX8)

Playable Playable PS2 Classic Emulator configuration available (NTSC-J). Config fixes graphical glitches on FMVs and frame rate issues. Meitantei Conan - Daiei Teikoku no Isan Not Available Not Available Playable Intro and the first location tested. Melty Blood: Act Cadenza Not Available Not Available Playable Config fixes freezes (DMA timing issue). Melty Blood: Actress Again Not Available Not Available Playable Config fixes freezes (DMA timing issue). Men in Black II: Alien Escape Available Playable Available Mercenaries: Playground of Destruction PS2 Classic Playable Available Empty emulator configuration. Slowdown during big events, otherwise playable. Metal Arms: Glitch in the System Available Playable Not Available Metal Gear Solid 2: Sons of Liberty

• Metal Gear Solid 2: Substance

• Metal Gear Solid HD Collection (PS3)

Minor Issues Minor Issues Minor Issues Config enables pressure sensitive controls. Slowdown in the graphically intensive scenes. Improper SCANMSK and AA1 support in the emulator causes issues with transparency (water, glasses, laser beams are opaque, infrared rays are visible with the naked eye) (GS issue). An HD remaster is available. Metal Gear Solid 3: Snake Eater

• Metal Gear Solid 3: Subsistence

• Metal Gear Solid HD Collection (PS3)

Playable Playable Playable Config bypasses black screen freeze after intro sequence, fixes getting stuck in trees and fake pits, improves the frame rate, and enables pressure sensitive controls. Improper SCANMSK and AA1 support in the emulator causes issues with transparency (GS issue). An HD remaster is available. Metal Saga Not Available Playable Available Metal Slug

• メタルスラッグ

Not Available Not Available Playable Metal Slug 3

• メタルスラッグ3

Available Not Available PS2 Classic Emulator configuration available. Metal Slug 4

• メタルスラッグ4

Available Available PS2 Classic Empty emulator configuration. Metal Slug 5

• メタルスラッグ5

Available Available PS2 Classic Empty emulator configuration. Metal Slug 6

• メタルスラッグ6

Not Available Not Available PS2 Classic Empty emulator configuration. Metal Slug Anthology

• Metal Slug Complete

• メタルスラッグ コンプリート

Playable Playable PS2 Classic Emulator configuration available (NTSC-U/C and NTSC-J). GX config fixes the Metal Slug 6 boot problem on the NTSC-U/C release (albeit does work randomly). Miami Vice Playable Not Available Not Available Config improves frame rate. Frame rate is low even on actual PS2 hardware. Michigan: Report From Hell Playable Not Available Available Micro Machines V4 Playable Available Not Available Midnight Club: Street Racing PS2 Classic PS2 Classic Playable Empty emulator configuration. City champ may not appear after defeating all other racers in New York. Makes it impossible to progress the game. This is a bug in the game itself, not an emulation issue. Midnight Club II PS2 Classic PS2 Classic Not Available Empty emulator configuration. Midnight Club 3: DUB Edition

• Midnight Club 3: DUB Edition Remix

PS2 Classic PS2 Classic Not Available Empty emulator configuration. Midway Arcade Treasures Available Playable Not Available Midway Arcade Treasures 2 Major Issues Major Issues Not Available Some games will trigger a data loss warning on startup then show a black screen, but the game is still on and reacts to input, rendering most of them unplayable. Side note when you quit those games, a different one is selected when you return to the main menu. Maybe game bugs out in emu and tries to load the wrong game. (Also the europe version have the same issue). Midway Arcade Treasures 3 Playable Playable Not Available Might and Magic VIII: Day of the Destroyer Not Available Not Available Playable Minority Report: Everybody Runs Available Available Available Mike Tyson Heavyweight Boxing Available Playable Not Available Config fixes SPS and major graphical glitches on characters and initial splash screen freeze. Mirai shonen Conan

• Future boy Conan

• 未来少年コナン

Not Available Not Available Unplayable Freeze, black screen when start the game. Mission Impossible - Operation Surma Playable Playable Available Mister Mosquito

• Mr Moskeeto

• Ka (蚊)

Playable Playable Available MLB 06: The Show Not Available Playable Available MLB Power Pros 2008 Not Available Playable Available MLB SlugFest: Loaded Not Available Playable Not Available Only tested half an inning pitting the Yankees against the Brewers in quickplay. Any slowdown or other issues beyond this point or in other modes are unknown, or haven't been noticed. For now, all that's known is that the game runs perfectly. Mobile Suit Gundam: Climax U.C.

• Kidou Senshi Gundam: Climax U.C.

Not Available Not Available Playable [SLPS-25627] Perfect Mobile Suit Gundam: Encounters in Space

• Kidou Senshi Gundam: Meguriai Sora

Not Available Available Available An HD remaster is available. Mobile Suit Gundam: Federation vs. Zeon

• Kidou Senshi Gundam: Renpou vs. Zeon DX

Available Playable Available [SLUS-20382: SuperSlim on HAN] FMV: OK, Graphics: OK, Framerate: OK, Audio: OK, Save: OK Mobile Suit Gundam: Gundam vs. Zeta Gundam

• Kidou Senshi Gundam: Gundam vs. Z Gundam

Not Available Minor Issues Available Some mobile armors (big zam and g-bull tested) sink on the floor,but the others units are perfectly playable. Mobile Suit Gundam: Journey to Jaburo

• Kidou Senshi Gundam

Not Available Playable Available Mobile Suit Gundam: The One Year War

• Kidou Senshi Gundam: Ichinen Sensou

Not Available Not Available Available Mobile Suit Gundam: Zeonic Front Not Available Playable Available An HD remaster is available. Mobile Suit Gundam Seed

• Kidou Senshi Gundam SEED

Not Available Not Available Available Mobile Suit Gundam Seed: Never Ending Tomorrow

• Kido Senshi Gundam SEED: Owaranai Ashita e

Not Available Available Available Mobile Suit Gundam Seed: Federation vs. Z.A.F.T.

• Kidou Senshi Gundam Seed: Rengou vs Z.A.F.T.

Not Available Not Available Playable Mobile Suit Gundam Seed Destiny: Federation vs. Z.A.F.T. II Plus

• Kidou Senshi Gundam Seed Destiny: Rengou vs Z.A.F.T. II Plus

Not Available Not Available Playable Mobile Suit Z Gundam: AEUG Vs. Titans

• Kidou Senshi Z Gundam: AEUG Vs. Titans

Not Available Not Available Available Mojo! Available Playable Not Available Monster House Minor Issues Playable Not Available In the PAL version it only crashed once in the whole game, after that it can be played normally. Monster Hunter Available Playable Available Monster Hunter 2 Not Available Not Available Playable Will not be able to save if played from ISO. Monster Jam: Maximum Destruction Playable Available Not Available Monster Rancher 3 Not Available Playable Available Creating a monster from disc slot is not possible due to netemu’s disc emulation. Maybe possible to emulate disc swap with config. Monster Rancher 4 Not Available Playable Available it works fine,but only played for 30 minutes,need further testing. Monster Rancher EVO Not Available Playable Available Mortal Kombat: Armageddon Minor Issues Minor Issues Not Available Has some fps drops in fights with detailed sceneries (same as MKD). Works without any issues besides that. PAL set to 60hz mode improves framerates and Progressive Scan improves upon it even further. Mortal Kombat: Deadly Alliance Available Minor Issues Not Available Framerate drops sometimes, but still playable. Mortal Kombat: Deception Minor Issues Minor Issues Not Available Config forces analog controller mode. Some fps drop in very detailed sceneries, although is still playable. PAL 50HZ retains same slowdown as US version, yet running 60HZ on PAL almost fixes it completely, yet some characters, weapons, and stages present noticeable lag but it usually isn't too bad. Chamber of artifacts stage runs unplayably slow. Mortal Kombat: Shaolin Monks Playable Playable Not Available Config fixes graphical glitches and slowdown. The first memory card screen could say that your game save may be corrupted, but it is not and is still loadable through the main menu. Moto X Maniac Playable Not Available Not Available Motocross Mania 3 Available Playable Not Available MotoGP Available Playable Available Make sure that game is detected as PS2CD (Blue disc in XMB). MotoGP 07 Available Available Available MotoGP 2 Available Playable Available MotoGP 3 Available Playable Available Motor Mayhem Available Playable Not Available Some weapon effects appear minorly glitchy. Motorsiege: Warriors of Primetime PS2 Classic Not Available Not Available Empty emulator configuration. Main menu sometimes has blacked out options but still works fine and can select things no problem (When running on ISO). MotorStorm: Arctic Edge Minor Issues Playable Not Available PAL version for some reason can't restart the main menu's FMV video and makes the game lag alot there, to make it disappear just go to Choose a vehicle menu and the lag will go a way, but if you go back to the main menu the issue will occur again after some seconds, however, it's not gamebreaking. Gameplay runs 100% perfect on both versions.

On NTSC (USA) the FMV video restarts normally.

Mr. Bean Playable Not Available Not Available Mr. Golf PS2 Classic Not Available Available Empty emulator configuration. MTV Music Generator 2 Available Playable Not Available MTV Music Generator 3: This Is the Remix Playable Playable Not Available Config fixes texture/polygons flickering. MTV's Celebrity Deathmatch Available Playable Not Available MTX Mototrax Available Playable Not Available Config fixes graphical/texture issues. Musashi: Samurai Legend

• Musashiden II: Blademaster

• 武蔵伝II ブレイドマスター

Playable Playable Playable Config fixes graphical glitches and wrong NPC calculations. Mushihimesama Not Available Not Available Playable Music 3000

• Funkmaster Flex's Digital Hitz Factory

Major Issues Major Issues Not Available Game has extreme stuttering issues. Created music plays fine. MVP 06: NCAA Baseball Not Available Playable Not Available MVP 07: NCAA Baseball Not Available Playable Not Available MVP Baseball 2005 Not Available Playable Available MX Superfly Playable Available Not Available MX vs. ATV Unleashed Available Playable Available Emulator configuration available. Config fixes graphical glitches. MX vs. ATV Untamed Available PS2 Classic Not Available Emulator configuration available (NTSC-U/C). Config fixes graphical glitches. MX World Tour: Featuring Jamie Little PS2 Classic Available Not Available Empty emulator configuration. MXRider Available Playable Not Available My Street Minor Issues Minor Issues Not Available Config fixes invisible characters (M-bit related). Some frame rate slowdown in detailed areas. Sonic Gems Collection Minor Issues Not Available Minor Issues Sonic The Fighters (which is also available standalone on PSN) barely works, frame rate can drop to single figures, many graphical errors and the sound is all messed up. Frame-rate on Sonic R is also noticeably slower, multiplayer seems to not render the map, characters, or any objects. Still playable in singleplayer though. Seems to be a chance of a hard freeze on exiting games in the collection too.

Japanese version has same issues as EU version. However, there doesn't seem to be a chance for the games to freeze here. Games tested were Sonic R, Sonic The Fighters, and the Streets of Rage Trilogy. Sonic Heroes PS2 Classic Playable PS2 Classic Emulator configuration available (NTSC-J).
